page.title: 06SHELLEY'S DAY-SPARSHOLT
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and have egg on toast.I walk to school at 8.15 and play on the playground.The bell goes at 8.45 and we line up to go into class.First we read silently for 20 minutes.Then we do maths.Next we have assembly for the whole school (there are 64 pupils) where we hear a story and sing two hymns. After that we have a short playtime and then do writing until lunchtime.We eat lunch in the staffroom because our new hall isn't finished.Most children have sandwiches.After a longer play we do some work on our project about wind and energy.Then we have music followed by a game of longball.When the bell goes I go home,watch television and have my tea.I go to bed about 9.00p.m.
